title: Winning is everything?
brief_description: Looks at the intense pressure placed by parents, teachers and coaches on young children in competitive sporting events, at the high drop-out rates in all sports, and at the need to emphasise enjoyment and basic skills acquisition as a foundation for recreation in later life. Suitable for tertiary level.
